message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, $900000 is a bit below my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1050000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1000000. Can you consider that?

I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob. However, I was thinking that $1000000 is a bit too low considering the product's value. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get at least $1050000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm counteroffering at $1025000. What do you think?
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1010000. Can you consider that?

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob, but I'm still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $1030000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower. What do you think?
I understand this is your final offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1020000. Can you reconsider?

I'm surprised you're still willing to negotiate, Bob. However, I'm not willing to budge from my previous offer. I'm sticking with $1030000. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options. This is my last offer, and I'm not going any lower.
I understand you're not willing to budge, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $1015000. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
